alert.note: Alert for Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 5:50PM EDT until June 17 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Sumter County in central South Carolina... East central Richland County in central South Carolina... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 550 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Shaw Air Base, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Sumter, South Sumter, Millwood, Poinsett State Park, Pinewood, Wedgewood, Cane Savannah, East Sumter, Cherryvale, Lakewood, Privateer and Stateburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
